data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mirab-Balou, Majid, Tong, Xiao-Li, Wang, Jun, Chen, Xue-Xin (2013): A new Odontothrips species (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3736 (5): 598-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.5.10
